name: Fantasy Realm
hints: Use concrete, visual symbols that create clear mental images
Keep spatial relationships consistent throughout the metaphor
Travelers represent execution or runtime behavior
Villages, buildings, and rooms represent scopes or contexts
Keys and scrolls represent references or pointers to data
Orbs, artifacts, and treasure represent data or values
Portals and doorways represent function calls or transitions
Guards and rules represent constraints or validation
Maps and ledgers represent tracking or state management
